ygData.messageBody:
oh you truly are evil, but there is truth in that Danielle. Make a toon and just try the tutorial to get used to it then go have some fun killing skellies and orcs. After a long day's work you wouldn't believe the amount of frustration you can get rid of beating up on some of these things. (record so far is 36 hours helping a friend camp a zone for a turn in)
 
Flaumigavylke 56 BST
Aracana Imperil Officer
Quellious
